content.html: I got into SVG and web animation and generative stuff because it was the last vestige of the creative 'old web' that I fell in love with as a youngster. Can't explain how tired I've felt, watching that little creative pocket of calm get smothered to death by NFT's and capitalism
content.value:
I got into SVG and web animation and generative stuff because it was the last vestige of the creative 'old web' that I fell in love with as a youngster.

Can't explain how tired I've felt, watching that little creative pocket of calm get smothered to death by NFT's and capitalism
